title: SKITTERSTACK: CI auto-deploys to waterbug.lan
description: In skitterstack repo: Commits trigger Forgejo runner that auto-deploys to waterbug.lan. No manual SSH needed.

title: REMINDER: Check beads (bd ready) for reminders and context when working in this repo
description: At the start of working in this repo, run 'bd ready' to see any standing reminders or open tasks. Use 'bd create' to add new reminders or tasks. Beads provides persistent memory across sessions.

title: REMINDER: Always use jj (jujutsu) for version control, NOT git commands
description: This repo uses jj (jujutsu) for version control. NEVER use git add, git commit, git push, etc. Instead use jj commands like: jj status, jj diff, jj commit, jj describe, jj bookmark, jj git push, etc. This is a standing policy, not a task to complete.
